snippet: "American Idol" narrowed the field to 13 final contestants this week, but the real star of the show turned out to be Jimmy Iovine, who injected some much needed candor into the proceedings.
abstract: "American Idol" narrowed the field to 13 final contestants this week, but the real star of the show turned out to be Jimmy Iovine, who injected some much needed candor into the proceedings.

headline.main: Straight Shots on 'Idol,' at Last, Courtesy of Jimmy Iovine
